thread.title: Agave shortages threaten Mexico tequila industry

title: Agave shortages threaten Mexico tequila industry
text:
Agave shortages threaten Mexico tequila industry 7:21am EST - 01:52 
Tequila producers in the Mexican state of Jalisco - the liquor's heartland - are facing a worsening shortage of the agave they need to make the drink. Mounting demand from abroad is one factor in a developing crisis for the industry. David Pollard reports.
